All out of the box API's like Vision API, Natural Language API are pre-trained models. They need less technical expertise and even non data scientists can train models using them. D is not the answer, as the API's are pre-trained and don't need custom training.

The AI Platform training service allows you to train models using a wide range of different customization options. You can also select different ways to customize your training application. You can submit your input data for AI Platform to train using a built-in algorithm (beta)
